title: Pseudorandom Generators for Unbounded-Width Permutation Branching Programs
timeline: A manuscript was first posted online in September 2020; the paper was presented at ITCS in January 2021.
version-notes: The ITCS proceedings version and the ECCC version are the same except for formatting.

errata.text: The proof of Corollary 2.6 is not correct. See Corollary 5.1.17 in my PhD dissertation for a corrected version, and similarly see Claim 5.1.14 in my PhD dissertation for a corrected version of Theorem 3.8 in the paper. The main results of the paper are unaffected.

recognition: Oded Goldreich discusses the paper in this blog post.
